data.eml:eml: Revised diagnosis of the genus Gonorhynchus McClelland (Teleostei: Cyprinidae: Labeonini) with redescription of G. latius (Hamilton) and revalidation of G. wattanah (Sykes)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ciccotto, Patrick J., Page, Lawrence M. (2016): Revised diagnosis of the genus Gonorhynchus McClelland (Teleostei: Cyprinidae: Labeonini) with redescription of G. latius (Hamilton) and revalidation of G. wattanah (Sykes). Zootaxa 4127 (3): 471-492, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4127.3.4
